member.summary: Get or set the image size in pixels. Valid value is from 32 to 512.

member.name: P:Competition.Program.Api.Models.Request.Image.GenerateQRCodeRequest.CorrectionLevel
member.summary:
Get or set the Level of Reed-Solomon error correction. Valid value is from 0 to 3.
0: Allows recovery of 7% of the code text
1: Allows recovery of 15% of the code text
2: Allows recovery of 25% of the code text
3: Allows recovery of 30% of the code text
